item.name: Long Bow of Minor Crit Storing
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
This bow can hold up to 3 charges.
When you roll a crit you can instead opt to store the crit as a charge
Charges can be spend in two way's
1. During an attack to upgrade a normal hit to a critical hit
2. As a reaction to cancel a crit of any enemy within 30 ft
Adding this chain to a melee weapon gives it the two-handed and finesse properties if it doesn't already have the two-handed property.
Taking the Two-Handed Weaponmaster feat allows you to attach two-handed and versatile weapons to a chain without penalty. In case of a versatile weapon the two-handed dmg dice is used
